value.title: Support concurrency in Blob storage apps with ETags and blob leases
value.excerpt: In this module you will learn how to implement application code to manage concurrency in blob storage.

value.title: Support data classification with private and hybrid clouds
value.excerpt: Discussion of the private and hybrid cloud solutions for government customers to enforce data sovereignty, meet compliance requirements, and protect sensitive data.

value.title: Test hypothesis by simulating  statistics
value.excerpt: learn how to test hypothesis by simulating statistics

value.title: The Mojifier - Create a Slack bot that replaces people's faces with emojis matching their emotion
value.excerpt: Learn how to get images, calculate emotion, match emotions to emojis, and replace faces with emoji.

value.title: Secure your infrastructure with threat modeling
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the foundation of threat modeling to identify enterprise risks and find ways to reduce or eliminate them.

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Trigger an Azure Event Grid workflow from an IoT device
value.excerpt: Trigger an Azure Event Grid workflow from an IoT device

value.title: Troubleshoot tightly coupled HPC applications on HBv2, HC, and HB series virtual machines
value.excerpt: Troubleshoot underperforming tightly coupled HPC applications and runtime failures.

value.title: Understand the normal curve
value.excerpt: Learn about the normal curve

value.title: Upgrade and migrate Windows Server IaaS virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn to migrate a workload running in Windows Server to an infrastructure as a service (IaaS) virtual machine (VM) and to Windows Server 2019 by using Windows Server migration tools or the Storage Migration Service.

value.title: Use Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools for transforming the data in the lake
value.excerpt: Use Azure Synapse serverless SQL pools for transforming the data in the lake

value.title: Use built-in functions and GROUP BY in Transact-SQL
value.excerpt: Use built-in functions and GROUP BY in Transact-SQL

value.title: Use the Q# libraries
value.excerpt: Learn about libraries in Q# and how to add them to your projects, discover the Q# API documentation, implement another application of Grover's algorithm using the Standard and Numerics libraries, and document your own code.

value.title: Using IoT Central with Connected Field Service for Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: This module will focus on using IoT Central with Connected Field Service add-on for Dynamics 365 for Field Service.  The module will walk you through building an IoT Central application and escalating the alerts into Dynamics 365.

value.title: Write Subqueries in T-SQL
value.excerpt: Write Subqueries in T-SQL

value.title: Accelerating HPC Storage with the Azure FXT Edge Filer | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In high performance computing (HPC) workloads, access to storage matters. In this episode, Scott Hanselman and Ron Hogue discuss the new Azure FXT Edge Filer, a new appliance that creates a powerful cache on-premises connecting network attached storage (NAS) and Azure Blob. value.title: An intro to Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0 | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Chris Anderson joins Donovan Brown to discuss Azure Cosmos DB JavaScript SDK 2.0, which adds support for multi-region writes, a new fluent-style object model—making it easier to reference Azure Cosmos DB resources without an explicit URL—and support for promises and other modern JavaScript features.
